Working with Box Panels

The uix.BoxPanel class provides some extra buttons and callbacks that can be used to design advanced user interface layouts. This section illustrate how to create panels equipped with context help, as well as panels that can be minimized or undocked.

Contents

  • Context Help
  • Minimize and Maximize
  • Dock and Undock
